item.title: Dynamics CRM - Replacing old CRM 4 API references with regular expressions
item.description: When upgrading Dynamics CRM 2011 to the most recent set of updates, it turns out that CRM 4 API stuff was no longer supported, even though the Microsoft code validation tool said that it should all work in IE! >:-[ So I needed to quickly replace loads of old CRM 4 API references, such as crmForm.all.some_field.DataValue = 1; with the newer CRM 2011 API, which in this example would look like:
